alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 9:59AM CST until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following points on the Illinois River... Illinois River at Valley City. Illinois River at Meredosia. Illinois River at La Grange LD. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Meredosia. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Beach Road just north of Shady Acres floods near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Monday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning and continue rising to 19.4 feet Sunday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Illinois River Meredosia 17.0 15.2 15.7 16.4 17.2 18.1 18.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
